article_title: Helping patients be better healthcare consumers
article_text:

01:44 Interview with woman who almost lost daughter to liposuction procedure

article_metadata.title: Helping patients be better healthcare consumers | Miami Herald

og.description: Healthcare reform is happening at a rapid pace, and every American can expect to feel the effects as the Affordable Care Act is fully implemented over the next five years. The most significant piece of healthcare legislation since Medicare was established 50 years ago, it will change the way healthcare is delivered — and paid for.
